A: 1. A person that is regarded as a special person because he has done something brave is known as (a) Governor (b) President (c) Hero
2. _______________ is a popular dance among the Tiv people (a) Ekombi (b) Swange (c) Bata
3. Okun are the ______________ speaking group in Kogi state (a) Yoruba (b) Hausa
4. The Mumuye are also known as _____________(a) Okun (b) Fulani (c) Gengle
5. The Mumuye can be found in ____________ state (a) Adamawa (b) Taraba (c) Bauchi
6. ____________is an example of a town where majorly Okun people can be found (a) Kaaba (b) Lagos
7. The traditional occupation of Fulani men is _____________ (a) Farming (b) Cattle rearing
8. _____________ is a cultural festival of the Ibibio (a) Egungun (b) Ekpe
9. The language spoken by the Igala is _______________(a) Efik (b) Igala (c) Hausa
10. The _____________ people can be found in towns like Oturkpo, Owukpa and Ogboju (a) Idoma (b) Igala (c) Fulani
